# Unigear Bombing Ski Helmet Speakers

### What is M@C Discount?

We buy returns by the truckload from retailers, like Amazon, Walmart, Lowes
and Home Depot. We list the items individually on over 50,000 daily online
auctions.

Bids can be placed via web browser or iOS/Android app. Every item starts at
just $1, with no reserve price.

The winner has 3 days to pick up the item from the appropriate warehouse.

Conditions of items will be either LIKE-NEW, OPEN BOX or DAMAGED. We do our
best to describe the items and their condition, however, all sales are final.

All items can be inspected in-person (and you are encouraged to do so) prior
to bidding. If you can't inspect, you can enjoy return protection by either
using Buyers Assurance or becoming a Premium Buyers Club member.

Read our FAQs to learn more

### M@C Gives Back!

### Lemoyne Center - May of 2021

Amount Raised: $900

#### The Lemoyne Center develops, shapes, defines and stabilizes our community
through education arts, health and recreation programs.

 __Washington, PA

### Blessings in a Backpack - August of 2021

Amount Raised: $1506

#### Blessings in a Backpack mobilizes communities, individuals, and resources
to provide food on the weekends for school aged children across America who
might otherwise go hungry.

 __Washington, PA

### 2000 Turkeys - November of 2021

Amount Raised: $1400

#### Aims to provide Thanksgiving dinners to Washington County families in
need.

 __Washington, PA

### East End Brewing Company - Jeremiah's Place - May of 2022

Amount Raised: $8,837

#### Provides Emergency Child Care Services for children ages 0-6 a few hours
or days based on the needs of each individual family.

 __Pittsburgh Mills, PA

### Wreaths Across America - June of 2022

Amount Raised: $3,678

#### Remember the Fallen. Honor those who serve. Teach the next generation the
value of freedom. All veterans will get a wreath who served in our armed
forces.

 __Washington, PA

### Western PA Diaper Bank - May of 2023

Amount Raised: $2,433

#### To ensure babies in need are clean, healthy and dry.

 __Pittsburgh Mills, PA

### Cancer Bridges - June of 2023

Amount Raised: $3,400

#### They help individuals and families navigate their cancer journey through
a breadth of free programs, workshops, and bervices.

 __Pittsburgh Mills, PA
